de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation

Class InitialMarkingValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation.AbstractValidator
      • de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation.InitialMarkingValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidator

    public class InitialMarkingValidator
extends AbstractValidator
    Sets the initial marking (token on the start place) if the model was modified but leaves an existing initial marking from a PNML file unchanged in case of the first validation of the model. To be used in combination with the ValidationController.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320
